name: Slimes Rush
description:
Fight against the relentless advance of the slimes and save your space base from enemy attack

Instructions

Left/right arrow to move the player

Hold down the "E" key near a button to control the shooting power and throw a clone

Free Game Assets Used

Sci-fi tileset by Buch: https://opengameart.org/users/buch
Character asset by Hyptosis: https://opengameart.org/users/joshmckay
Slimes assets by Calciumtrice: https://opengameart.org/content/animated-slime

Font asset by TinyWorlds : https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah
